name: Virtual DAD Amazing Family Man
description:
This game is a sequel of Virtual DAD, and just amazing!

There lives an amazing family in neighborhood where resides a dad who takes care of his family, pet & neighbors. He perform household activities to support his family. Besides performing daily multi task household chores the real challenge is to manage all tasks properly & perfectly. Withdraw money from bank, planting seeds, changing puncture tire of car, reporting police for robbery, go for jogging with friends & many more exciting & interesting activities are waiting for you.

In this amazing game you have to complete the given tasks to progress to next levels as difficulty level increases with your progress. 3D Models, Perfect Control, interesting tasks, coolest family, realistic arts, awesome soundtrack are going to lead you on a new journey of excitement. Engaging chores with twists will amuse you!

Sometimes all you need is to have a happy family!

Virtual Dad: Amazing Family Man Features:
• Interesting game play and multiple 3D levels
• Efficient controls for the given activities
• Exciting and fun filled tasks
• Realistic sounds and graphics in the virtual game
• Family man life simulation
• Fun & Easy to play
